trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio Solution Explorer, right-click the Windows Store app project, click **Store** > **Associate App with the Store...**.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio Solution Explorer, right-click the Windows Store app project, click **Store** > **Associate App with the Store...**.

trans-unit.source: In the wizard, click **Next**, sign in with your Microsoft account, type a name for your app in **Reserve a new app name**, then click **Reserve**.
trans-unit.target: In the wizard, click **Next**, sign in with your Microsoft account, type a name for your app in **Reserve a new app name**, then click **Reserve**.

trans-unit.source: After the app registration is successfully created, select the new app name, click **Next**, and then click **Associate**.
trans-unit.target: After the app registration is successfully created, select the new app name, click **Next**, and then click **Associate**.

trans-unit.source: This adds the required Windows Store registration information to the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: This adds the required Windows Store registration information to the application manifest.

trans-unit.source: Repeat steps 1 and 3 for the Windows Phone Store app project using the same registration you previously created for the Windows Store app.
trans-unit.target: Repeat steps 1 and 3 for the Windows Phone Store app project using the same registration you previously created for the Windows Store app.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the [Windows Dev Center](https://dev.windows.com/en-us/overview), sign-in with your Microsoft account, click the new app registration in **My apps**, then expand **Services** > **Push notifications**.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the [Windows Dev Center](https://dev.windows.com/en-us/overview), sign-in with your Microsoft account, click the new app registration in **My apps**, then expand **Services** > **Push notifications**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Push notifications** page, click **Live Services site** under **Microsoft Azure Mobile Services**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Push notifications** page, click **Live Services site** under **Microsoft Azure Mobile Services**.

trans-unit.source: In the **App Settings** tab, make a note of the values of **Client secret** and **Package SID**.
trans-unit.target: In the **App Settings** tab, make a note of the values of **Client secret** and **Package SID**.

trans-unit.source: App setting in the developer center
trans-unit.target: App setting in the developer center

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] The client secret and package SID are important security credentials.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] The client secret and package SID are important security credentials.

trans-unit.source: Do not share these values with anyone or distribute them with your app.
trans-unit.target: Do not share these values with anyone or distribute them with your app.
